As he sat a few feet from me in the newsroom he probably heard me doing it, laughing about it etc and told others to do it. I worked under Andy Coulson for a year and a half at NOTW.`` The real scandal is David Cameron would have been briefed:` We can probably get away with this one,' when hiring Andy Coulson , so Mr. David Cameron is either a liar or an idiot. Andy Coulson was editor of the Rupert Murdoch-owned News of The World in 2006, when the paper's royal editor, Clive Goodman , was arrested for hacking into voicemails belonging to Princes William and Harry.
